Message.Msg: You are a long term investor, sir. Coke is still a good stock in my opinion but I think it may not grow as quickly in the future as it did in the past. It's pretty mature. If they can keep their dividend up then it will remain a good investment. Hope you have many more healthy and happy years.

That is a cool story. My grandfather showed me his Disney stock certificate for 100 shares that he has been in his safety deposit box, when he bought Disney shares in 1956. He never sold it and it passed down to my father who is going to pass it down (I hope me). I don't know about what will happen to our great country, but I know great companies like KO and DIS are here forever as they are legend icons and just that good. I am a believer in KO and just want to own it for a long time to come.
Not necessarily true ,profile could easily have been entered , say 10 yrs ago, making 18 yrs old in 1956. Most people give a profile one time and do not update.

I've held KO for 124 years and 18 stock splits. I plan to hold it for another 240 years then I might take some profits. Seriously, hold KO like MO, PM, KFT and McD and just watch it grow with dividend reinvestment. A thing of beauty!
